name: Asagos
description:
Asagos is a horror/mystery game set within the Canadian Parliament buildings during a fateful evening in 1916. You play as an Inspector of the Dominion Police, tasked with meeting a Member of Parliament to discuss a unique astronomical event. But the hill has far greater secrets lying in wait.


Gameplay
Question the range of suspects within Parliament Hill, but be careful not to reveal too much. Drawing too much attention to yourself and from the wrong people could entice what lays beneath.

Features
- A Subtlety System, which reacts to your questions, making the game easier or harder depending on your choices
- Evade the Manifestations that stalk Parliament's halls, drawn to your intrusion.
- Explore Canada's secret history, interacting with a range of famous political figures... yes that is supposed to be a good thing
- A beautiful soundtrack by Sam Dillard
- Allegedly Edutainment
